resources.string: Please sign in with your phone number to continue. Authority will be using this number to contact you in case of emergency.

Please grand the location permission to continue. This app primarily works using Bluetooth low energy technology. For this to work, we need the location permission. We also track your location, but if you don\'t want that, please opt-out from the app settings.
%1$s requires bluetooth to be turn on to ensure your safety
Service of this app is temporarily unavailable
Bluetooth not available in this device. So unable to start.
We are tracking people around you with this app installed on their phones. We respect your privacy. Your data is safe and secure with us and it won\'t be misused.

Tracker is off. Which means there is no use of having this app on your phone. This option is provided only to respect your privacy when it is really required. Please turn it on and assure the safety of you and the people around you.
Allowing to collect the location information will help us optimally assure more safety. You can opt-out from tracking location if really necessary.
This app requires Bluetooth to be turned on for its operation. We\'ll notify you when Bluetooth is off.
This app requires Bluetooth to be turned on for its operation. We\'ll notify you when Bluetooth is off.
